about_the_game:
Draw Lines to Save the Boy!

This puzzle game challenges you to draw lines to protect the player from obstacles and enemy attacks! The lines you draw act as barriers, shielding the boy from harm, but be careful—if the line touches the player, it's game over.

Use the terrain and traps wisely to protect the boy from incoming dangers!

There's no single correct solution to these puzzles. Whether you protect him in a creative, artistic way or come up with an unconventional strategy, it's all up to you. Save the day with your unique drawings!

How to Play

  • Carefully observe the stage and identify the dangers threatening the boy.

  • Draw lines to protect the boy from these dangers.

  • Successfully protect the boy to clear the stage.

  • Failed attempts? No worries—you can retry the stage as many times as you like until you succeed!

Key Features of This Game

  • Globally Popular Puzzle Game: A hit app played worldwide! This game has topped the puzzle game charts in 54 countries on iOS and 17 countries on Android, and now it makes its much-anticipated debut on Steam!

  • Popular Among YouTubers: Frequently featured in gameplay videos by famous YouTubers, this quirky game is perfect for those who enjoy fun, offbeat experiences.

  • Unlimited Creativity: There’s no right or wrong way to solve the puzzles—draw your own unique shapes and protect the boy in your own style!

  • Perfect for Quick Fun: Play in short bursts during your free time—ideal for casual gaming and killing time.

  • New Features for Steam: Includes a brand-new stage selection screen and all stages unlocked from the start, so you can jump into any level you like!

  • Deceptively Challenging: Looks simple but can be surprisingly tricky! A fun puzzle game that also trains your brain.

  • Hell Stages: Almost impossible to clear in one attempt—can you take on the ultimate challenge?

Recommended For:

  • Anyone who wants to play a popular game.

  • Gamers looking for highly recommended titles.

  • Those who want a casual and easy-to-pick-up game.

  • Fans of simple yet entertaining games.

  • People looking for fun and interesting puzzle games.

  • Players who enjoy drawing games.

  • Brain-training enthusiasts.

  • Anyone who loves creative and challenging puzzles!
